name: Something to Cry About
description:
In Something to Cry About, your goal is to stop crap from polluting the environment - if you can do this, you'll win! 

To do this, you have to use Magda Sustainability, Inc.'s patented Crapbucket to catch all of the crap from falling into the environment. Unfortunately, that's not enough to save the planet.  You'll have to use the money you earn catching crap to invest in valuable infrastructure, such as recycling, preservation, and more.

It won't be easy, but the fate of the environment is in your hands!
